document.full_text: a 76-year-old florida imam and his son were ordered on monday to appear next week in a u.s. federal court where they face charges of providing support for the pakistani taliban.
document.title: imam, son in u.s. court over pakistani taliban charges
lines_and_colors: a 76-year-old florida imam and his son were ordered on monday to appear next week in a u.s. federal court where they face charges of providing support for the pakistani taliban.
